pullRequest.body:
Just to show the overall direction: this PR is just a tracking PR; it is easier to re-do the remaining pieces individually.

- [x] depends on: #19529 (and needs a merge afterwards)

---

The documenting of items should move into Tactic.Linter...
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

### PR summary [c64a270a65](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/15942/commits/c64a270a650434893fc6da7c434448ff01a344b0)

<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Util.SleepHeartbeats | 2 | 15 | +13 (+650.00%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic.Linter | 15 | 0 | -15 (-100.00%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic.Linter.HashCommandLinter | 4 | 2 | -2 (-50.00%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic.Linter.Lint | 4 | 2 | -2 (-50.00%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic.Linter.UnusedTactic | 4 | 2 | -2 (-50.00%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic.Linter.GlobalAttributeIn | 3 | 2 | -1 (-33.33%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic.Linter.HaveLetLinter | 3 | 2 | -1 (-33.33%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic.Linter.OldObtain | 3 | 2 | -1 (-33.33%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic.Linter.RefineLinter | 3 | 2 | -1 (-33.33%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic.Linter.Style | 3 | 2 | -1 (-33.33%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic.Common | 236 | 233 | -3 (-1.27%) |
| Mathlib.Geometry.Manifold.Instances.Real | 1622 | 1619 | -3 (-0.18%) |
| Mathlib.Analysis.SpecialFunctions.BinaryEntropy | 1638 | 1635 | -3 (-0.18%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic | 2163 | 2161 | -2 (-0.09%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
There are 4679 files with changed transitive imports taking up over 191030 characters: this is too many to display!
You can run `scripts/import_trans_difference.sh all` locally to see the whole output.

</details>

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ admitLinter`
`+ dollarSyntaxLinter`
`+ findDollarSyntax`
`+ getAdmit`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
I've got the impression that this is more a tracking PR and not ready for review. Please remove the "WIP" label again if that's incorrect and this should go on the queue.

I might say "different parts have been split into smaller PRs", but I guess that amounts to the same...
I'll merge master; perhaps the remaining PR can land as-is, or I'll split off another change.

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#19529~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (ðŸ¤–). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

I'm a bit confused by the state of this PR, also because I can't tell how much would be addressed by resolving the merge-conflict. Without looking at the queue to see what you already did, all the "stylistic changes" should probably be split into a bunch of `easy` PRs.

And then probably one PR per linter moving it in it's own file and adding documentation for it would seem reasonable

pullRequest.title: chore: move style linters into their own file; document all current linters

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#19529~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (ðŸ¤–). Happy coding!

I'm a bit confused by the state of this PR, also because I can't tell how much would be addressed by resolving the merge-conflict. Without looking at the queue to see what you already did, all the "stylistic changes" should probably be split into a bunch of `easy` PRs.

And then probably one PR per linter moving it in it's own file and adding documentation for it would seem reasonable
